******************************
Welcome to the sunraster Guide
******************************

Welcome to the ``sunraster`` User Guide. ``sunraster`` is a SunPy-affiliated
package designed for reading, manipulating and visualizing data taken
with slit spectrograph instruments.

* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
